lines.text: People aren't always what they appear to be. Don't forget that.
Why don't we begin with a question? What is a sex crime?
Not gettin' any!
[all the other students cheer]
a bit of Poison.
P-oison...
Good guess.
[Lets lose the sail rigging hitting Sam in the head and flinging him overboard]
I miss Dad.
I miss him too... sometimes...
No you don't!
He didn't HAVE to kill himself, Kelly.
No little bitch could ever make me cum.
Did Sam sell you up front on the idea of whacking Suzie?
[grabs Kelly]
That's murder, kid.
You - you are gonna fuck me over, aren't you?
Oh, for chrissake.
You are!
Are you retarded, or just brain-dead from whiffing fumes out there in the swamp?
That's that I am to you, isn't it? Swamp trash, just like my mom.
[Kelly tries to touch Suzie's shoulder, but Suzie bats her away]
Don't!
[Suzie slaps Kelly across the face]
[Kelly slaps Suzie back]

[Kelly shoves Suzie's head in the pool]
You stupid cunt!
I hate you! Son of a bitch!
Can I play too? Or is it just for boys?
Jesus! Where did she get the shoes? "Whores for less"?
[Suzie gives her the finger]
Good to see you girls getting along...
Kelly Van Ryan is accusing me of rape.
Kelly Van Ryan? As in Sandra Van Ryan?
As in, I'm fucked.
So you're the new chicken licker.
My mother would kill me if she knew I took the Rover.
[repeated line]

[to Suzie]
Did you enjoy being a guest of the state?
The conversation on this tape is totally unintelligible. What we have here, is you on the Van Ryan property, without a proper warrant, shooting a porn flick!
After tonight, the three of us are not to be seen together ever again.
After tonight.
Fuck off!

[She and Nicole are going to wash Sam's car]
So, where's your hose, Mr. Lombardo?
[last lines]
Suzie... Be good.
We've gotta stop. I'm gonna cum.
That never seemed to worry you out at the Glades.
I can't believe you called Sam. What's the matter with you?
I'm scared, that's what I'm scared, there's no one to trust.
You can trust me.
Ray. The conversation on this tape is totally unintelligible. What we have here, is you on the Van Ryan property, without a proper warrant, shooting a porn flick...
Did Sam Lombardo rape you?
Yeah, Okay? He did. He pushed me to the floor and he did it to me.
Kelly's pissed at Mr. Lombardo too. She's in love with him. I mean she's been her whole fantasy since her old man died, and then she found out that Mr. Lombardo was doing her mom, and that was it.
[Crowd gasps]
What? Kelly!
You skanky bitch!
[Kelly throws a glass at Suzie but Suzie dodges it]
Get your fucking hands off of me? Don't you know who I am?
Hello, Kelly.
Drop dead. You know how my mom's paying you off? She's breaking my trust. I can't touch it until she's dead, and now she's breaking it to pay you.
I'm sorry, Kelly.
Why don't you start fucking her again! You can spend it together! I hate you!
[Kelly swings her binder at Sam, hitting his trophy, it falls to the floor and breaks]
I fucking hate you, you son of a bitch! I fucking hate you!
Whooo, it worked! we screwed the bitch!
[Kelly kisses Sam]
It worked just like you said. What's wrong?
You scared the shit out of me. What's wrong, is you're coming here. That's what's wrong. Are you fuckin' crazy?
Yeah, I'm crazy. Ask my mom.
My daughter does NOT get raped in Blue Bay!

[Ken is wearing a neck brace]
What do you do to your neck?
Oh, this? I don't have to wear it all the time.
[looks out the window and takes it off]
There was an insurance guy around here earlier.

[looking at a photo]
Hey Art, this is one hell of a fish.
It's a Barracuda. If you weren't so busy chasing booty at the yacht club, you could have caught one for yourself.
You aren't going to eat that thing are you? It's Barracuda, it's poisonous, it'll kill you.
Shit, man. I could say that about most of the girls you date.
Maybe you didn't hear me, Lombardo. You're finished in Blue Bay. And if I find you around my daughter again, you'll be finished, period. Get the fuck out of here.

[Passing Sandra Van Ryan's limo and honking the horn]
Hey, look who we've got here. Hey, Sandra!
I want you to nail that shyster's balls to the wall!
Well, that might have been possible if miss not-so-bright here hadn't started throwing things in court.
Fuck off!
I can't believe you're going to let them, get away with this... shit!
I don't think you understand, Sandy. Your little princess here committed perjury. It will be all I can do to keep her fucking little ass out of jail.
Well... what are we going to do?
Sure took you guys long enough to get here. What if someone was trying to strangle me, or... fuck me up the ass or something?

[TV Version]
You - you are gonna blow me over, aren't you?
I'm innocent. Goddamit!
No little girl can ever make me come.
